text.1: I'm Daniel Gaiduk and I'm a trained full stack developer.
text.2: As a versatile all-rounder, I take on both front-end and back-end application development tasks. With a solid understanding of the technical basics of web and software development, I can either create complex applications from scratch or extend existing systems.
text.3: My approach is characterized by creative innovation, constantly looking for new ways to optimize applications. Furthermore, I appreciate teamwork and like to contribute to (create) great things together.
text.4: Learning, programming and coffee - the three pillars of my life.
